1817772953: Chinyengo si mtundu watsopano waupandu. Ndithudi, akatswiri ofukula za m’mabwinja afukula zipangizo zolimbana ndi chinyengo zimene anthu akale a ku Sumer anakonza zoti azinyamula ziweto popanda kuwononga pafupifupi zaka 10,000 zapitazo! M’malo mwawo, amaika zizindikiro zadongo, chilichonse choimira nyama, mkati mwa mpira wadongo wotchedwa “bulla.” Ng’ombeyo inkayenda limodzi ndi nkhosa zikamachoka kwa wogula kupita kwa wogula. Ngakhale pamenepo, eni mabizinesi anali ndi nkhawa kuti si onse omwe anali kuchita nawo omwe akukwera. Zambiri zasintha m'zaka 10,000, koma kufunikira kokhala ndi luso popewa chinyengo kumakhalabe ndi ife. Masiku ano, nkhani yachinyengo yolipira pa intaneti ndiyofunikira kwambiri. Ndi intaneti, anthu achinyengo akhala aluso kwambiri polimbana ndi chinyengo. Njira zatsopano zothetsera vutoli, komabe.

Izi zingatanthauze kugwiritsa ntchito kirediti kadi yobedwa kuyitanitsa malonda pa intaneti kapena kutenga akaunti yakubanki ndikusamutsa ndalama zake mosaloledwa. Pali zosiyana zambiri, koma zonse zimakhala ndi zotsatira zofanana: wachinyengo amagwiritsa ntchito chidziwitso chabedwa kapena chidziwitso cha malipiro kuti abe kwa ogula, banki kapena wamalonda.

2551802342: - Tikukonzekera kuchira mwachangu ndikuyambiranso mabizinesi pambuyo pa kusokonekera kwakukulu kwabizinesi ndikuyankha poteteza antchito athu ndi katundu wathu, kuwunika zachuma ndi magwiridwe antchito, kuteteza mabuku ndi zolemba zamakampani, ndikulola makasitomala athu ndi omwe amawagwiritsa ntchito kuchitapo kanthu pa intaneti. Mwachidule, ndondomeko yathu yopititsira patsogolo bizinesi yapangidwa kuti ilole kampani yathu kuyambiranso ntchito mwachangu momwe tingathere, poganizira kukula ndi kuopsa kwa kusokonezeka kwabizinesi. Ma adilesi athu opitilira bizinesi: zosunga zobwezeretsera ndi kuchira; machitidwe onse ofunikira; kuwunika kwachuma ndi ntchito; njira zolumikizirana ndi makasitomala, antchito, ndi mabungwe oyang'anira; malo ena antchito; wofunikira wofunikira komanso kukhudzidwa kwamakasitomala; malipoti owongolera; ndikudziwitsa makasitomala athu mwachangu ngati sitingathe kupitiliza bizinesi yathu. Gulu lathu lothandizira limasunga zolembedwa zathu zofunika m'malo osiyanasiyana. Ngakhale kuti vuto lililonse ladzidzidzi limabweretsa mavuto apadera okhudzana ndi zinthu zakunja, monga nthawi ya tsiku ndi kuopsa kwa kusokonezeka, talangizidwa ndi dziwe lothandizira ili kuti cholinga chawo ndi kubwezeretsa ntchito zawo ndikutha kuyambiranso ntchito mofulumira. Ngakhale tayesetsa kuchepetsa chiwopsezo pogwiritsa ntchito magulu osiyanasiyana ogulitsa, ntchito zanu zitha kusinthidwa kapena kuimitsidwa panthawiyi.

Mulimonse momwe zingakhalire, tikukonzekera kupitiriza bizinesi, kutumiza ntchito kwa ogulitsa ena ngati kuli kofunikira, ndikukudziwitsani kudzera pa webusaiti yathu pa hcaptcha.com ndi tsamba lathu lachidziwitso pa hcaptchastatus.com momwe mungatithandizire. 477275453: Chifukwa Chiyani Ma API Ndi Chandamale Chodziwika Kwa Obera?
596347471: Ma Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) akhala chandamale chodziwika bwino kwa ochita zoipa pa intaneti. Pali zifukwa zambiri za izi, kuphatikiza kugwiritsa ntchito kwawo kwakukulu pakuphatikiza mapulogalamu. Ndizotheka kuchepetsa chiopsezo cha API, komabe.
3963216198: Kuti tikambirane chifukwa chake ma API ali chandamale chodziwika kwa obera, ndikofunikira kaye kaye pang'ono kuti mufotokoze tanthauzo la mawu oti "API." Lingaliro la API silili lachilendo konse. M'malo mwake, zolumikizira zolumikizira makina osiyanasiyana apakompyuta wina ndi mnzake, komanso zida zawo zamkati, zakhala zikuchitika kuyambira koyambirira kwa 1960s.
1047251718: Masiku ano, komabe, anthu akamalankhula za ma API, nthawi zonse amatanthauza ma API otengera miyezo. Awa ndi ma API opangidwa pogwiritsa ntchito miyezo yotseguka monga Representational State Transfer (REST) ndi kutsegula mafayilo amtundu wamba monga JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). Ma "RESTful API" oterowo, monga amadziwika, amatha kupangidwa popanda kufunikira kwa pulogalamu ya eni. Zotsatira za API zimatha kutumiza ndi kulandira mafoni a data ndi ndondomeko pakati pa mapulogalamu a mapulogalamu. Mwachitsanzo, pulogalamu yakubanki yam'manja imagwiritsa ntchito API kuti ipeze machitidwe a banki.
3195334319: Kugwiritsa ntchito komanso kusatetezeka kwa ma API
1903743785: Kubwera kwa ma API ozikidwa pamiyezo kunayimira kulumpha kwakukulu pakuphatikiza ntchito. 879362350: Ndi ma API atsopano omwe akugwira ntchito pa intaneti, zinakhala zotheka kulumikiza pulogalamu iliyonse kapena gwero la deta, kulikonse padziko lapansi, mosasamala kanthu za nsanja, schema ya data kapena chinenero cha mapulogalamu. Zotsatira zake, dziko la makompyuta tsopano lili mkati mwa kusintha kwa API. Pakhala pali kuphulika kwa kulumikizana pakati pa mapulogalamu ndi data. Ndizo zabwino, mpaka izo siziri.
3844432472: Kutseguka komanso kugwiritsidwa ntchito kwa ma API kumawapangitsa kukhala olemera modabwitsa kwa omwe akuwukira. Monga Wothandizira, ngati mukukhulupirira kuti mafunso ovuta akukhudza ziyeneretso zanu, luso lanu, kapena mphotho zanu, mutha kupereka mikangano yogwirizana ndi mafunso oyesa ovuta pogwiritsa ntchito mawonekedwe antchito kapena kudzera pa tikiti yamakina athu othandizira, mwachitsanzo kudzera pa imelo. ku
799274928: Zidziwitso za imelo zimatengedwa ngati zidziwitso zolembedwa pazolinga zonse zomwe zidziwitso zolembedwa zitha kufunidwa. Zidziwitso za imelo zimatengedwa kuti zidalandiridwa tsiku labizinesi pambuyo potumizidwa bwino kwa omwe akuyembekezeredwa.
